0f08c167-2d94-5e3a-8caf-fb9ddc9e7869.title: Insert Photos showing removed panels placed on A-Frame

meta.name: Remove panel from current position and place on adjacent A-Frame, Back of Sheet facing out

dd77664c-84d2-58d2-9d1b-504f1fd8627a.title: Insert Photos showing current condition of the Dowsil stiffener adhesion.

meta.name: Record panel number or position, take photo of current condition of the Dowsil adhesion

6ff79b51-13ca-50a8-83e5-7c3e1e4e9f31.title: Insert photos taken during process outlined above.

meta.name: Lightly abrade both sides of the desired stiffeners, spray Isopropyl and wipe off with clean rag. Photos to be taken during process

fa5e94c9-4ec7-571d-95e4-10b0b62469a7.title: Insert photo of batch number of Dowsil 795 located on box / carton of origin (outside of box)

meta.name: Record batch number of Dowsil 795 for warranty purposes

3d240ce3-75b8-562a-a144-92ef0fb184af.title: Insert photos taken during process outlined above.

meta.name: Apply generous amount of Dowsil 795 to both sides of stiffener, ensuring pregnation under the stiffener, apply watered detergent spray and comb off utilising tool. All excess product to be wiped on newspaper and placed in supplied bin. Photos to be taken at completion showing continuous application of Dowsil 795 to both sides of stiffeners

4a415597-d6e5-59ff-a7ad-db552564b319.title: Insert photos taken showing length of stiffener cutouts with tape measure

meta.name: While the DOWSIl 795 is curing and prior to step 7 check the stiffener cutouts at each end of the stiffeners. Take photos using a tape measuring showing the stiffener cutout lengths

5b0ac8cc-67cd-5218-979b-3b2758e9db89.title: Insert photos showing support brackets have been installed correctly where required (cutout lengths greater than 90mm)

meta.name: For checkouts with the length of the checkout over 90mm, install supporting brackets (3mm aluminium plate) to each side of the stiffener using x5 12ga Bimeatal Tek Screws to each side

78f05fe9-3353-5539-86d5-94d705f32b14.title: Insert photo of completed panel prior to re-installment

meta.name: Panel to remain on A frame for 10 minutes to enable to product to skin, then lifted back into its original fixed position.
Install custom angle brackets to stiffeners on panels the wrap around corners.
Install custom folded 3mm angles to corner routs, 6mm Spacer tape & 6 x 6mm bead of Dowil 795 on panels that wrap around corners.
